intro: Psychotria tenuissima, commonly known as the "little psychotria," is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its small, elliptic leaves and clusters of small, white to pale yellow flowers. It thrives in moist, shaded environments and is often found in humid forests. Psychotria tenuissima is notable for its role in traditional medicine and as a habitat for certain insect species.
